metadata.title: CVE-2017-9782 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - negligible
metadata.description:
JasPer 2.0.12 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service(heap-based buffer over-read and application crash) via a crafted image,related to the jp2_decode function in libjasper/jp2/jp2_dec.c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-9782` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libjasper-runtime - 1.900.1-debian1-2.4ubuntu1.3
libjasper1 - 1.900.1-debian1-2.4ubuntu1.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: jasper package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.900.1-debian1-2.4ubuntu1.3').
